page.title: 06UPPER EARLSCOURT MANOR.
page.content: The lady that lives at Upper Earlscourt Manor is called Elizabeth Davies. She has lived there for 18 months and is a house wife, her husband is a consultant for farming. she shops at Swindon,London,Bath and Cirensester, in her part time she gardens,sews and reads. Parts of the house are 500 years old. In the house there is a room that was shut up for centrerys because they thought it had Ghousts. This room is called Taffys room. The wind is very strong around Earlsecourt Manor, so they planted lots of trees down their long drive to brake up the wind.Around the back of the house there is some Elizebethen paneling made with oak beams and some bent beams with criss_cross bricks in the middle. There are also a pair of hatch doors where the smoke from the bread oven came out.It was a manor
